Title: Relates to enacting the "New York city small business rent stabilization act"
Summary: Enacts the "New York city small business rent stabilization act" instituting a commercial rent control system in the city of New York and creates the commercial rent guidelines board.
LawCode: Add Title 22 Chapter 12 §§22-1201 - 22-1213, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enacting the "New York city small business rent stabilization act"
